post:
All our servers are located in a carrier-neutral data center in Frankfurt, Germany. The connectivity is at 2,3 Gbit/s via redundant internet upstreams utilizing BGP. All our Dedicated Server plans include the following features:

  • No Risk - month to month contract!
  • Monthly payment via PayPal or VISA, MasterCard
  • ZERO setup fee!
  • Reboots free of charge!
  • Server Resets free of charge!
  • 1 TB traffic every month!
  • 100 Mbit/s switchport, fully burstable
  • up to 4 IP addresses included. Additional IP's possible (must be justified to RIPE)
  • Operating system as desired: Linux Debian Etch, Linux CentOS 5, Linux Fedora 7, Linux OpenSuSE 10.1, Linux Ubuntu 6.06, Linux Gentoo (installation performed by client), FreeBSD 6.2, Windows 2003 Web Edition (€21,24 EUR), Windows 2003 Standard Edition (€29.75 EUR)
  • Setup your Reverse-DNS in our Customer-Control Panel
  • Supported Control Panels: Direct Admin (€13.09 EUR), cPanel (€41.65 EUR)
  • Adult content allowed - if legal

During the order menue you are able to upgrade RAM, Harddrive, second Harddrive, Operating System, etc.:

the CPU Roulette Offer - AMD 64 Blowout:

http://valueserver.de/order.php?step=2&pid=25
  • AMD Athlon 64 3200+ up to 3800+
  • CPU assignment as available (the Roulette)
  • 32 & 64 bit
  • 512 MB DDR RAM
  • 80GB HDD
  • 1 TB Traffic
only €45.00 EUR (without VAT) / €53.55 EUR (incl. VAT)


http://valueserver.de/order.php?step=2&pid=7&promocode=INTEL_P4_30
  • Intel P4 3.0 GHz
  • 512 MB DDR1 RAM
  • 80GB HDD
  • 1 TB Traffic
only €42.00 EUR (without VAT) / €49.98 EUR (incl. VAT)


https://valueserver.de/order.html?step=2&pid=0000000015
  • AMD Opteron 248
  • 32 & 64 bit
  • 4096 MB DDR2 RAM
  • 2x 160GB
  • 1 TB Traffic
only €170.00 EUR (without VAT) / 202.30 EUR (incl. VAT)


A list of all our dedicated Servers can befound here: https://valueserver.de/dedicated.php

All our VPS Server are hosted on Intel Core2Duo/Core2Quad Systems with at least 2x2.4 Ghz and 4MB/8MB L2-Cache;
with at least 3 GB of RAM and a 1 TB HDD RAID System. As virtualisation software we use OpenVZ.

VPS Medium
http://valueserver.de/order.html?step=2&pid=22&promocode=VPS
  • CPU Power: 25%
  • RAM: 128 MB guaranteed - 256MB burstable
  • HDD Space: 10 GB

  • OS: Debian, Fedora, CenOS, Suse 9.x, OpenSuse 10.x

only €8.00 EUR (without VAT) / €9.52 EUR (incl. VAT)

If you want to check our performance: download the testfile from: http://tst.valueserver.de

Any questions? Considerations? We want to leave nothing to be desired! Contact us via:
skype: valueserver
e-mail: support@valueserver.de
For fastest response concerning technical questions use the support form at our homepage.
https://valueserver.de

VAT-Info: Clients inside the european union need to pay 19% VAT. Companies outside Germany with a valid VAT id or clients outside the EU get invoives WITHOUT VAT.
